languages.text: Allies that become targets of the Navigator's powers gain {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} equal to the {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}infusing{/g} parameter until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks.
languages.original_text: Союзники, ставшие целями сил навигатора, получают {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусы{/g} ко всем {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристикам{/g}, равные значению насыщения, до конца следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} навигатора. Этот бонус суммируется, и при каждом применении его действие продлевается до следующего хода навигатора.

traits.locale_text: Allies that become targets of the Navigator's powers gain bonuses to all their characteristics equal to the infusing parameter until the end of the Navigator's next turn. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks.

Allies that become targets of the Navigator's powers gain {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to all their characteristics equal to the {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}infusing{/g} parameter until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks.

Allies that become targets of the Navigator's powers gain {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} equal to the {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}infusing{/g} parameter until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks.

Allies that become targets of the Navigator's powers gain {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} equal to the {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}infusing{/g} parameter until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks.

languages.text: Verbündete, die von den Kräften des Navigators anvisiert werden, erhalten bis zum Ende des nächsten Zugs des Navigators {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Boni{/g} auf alle ihre {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}, und zwar entsprechend des Parameters {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Durchtränkung{/g}. Dieser Bonus wird gestapelt und mit jedem Stapel bis zum nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} des Navigators verlängert.
languages.original_text: Allies that become targets of the Navigator's powers gain {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} equal to the {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}infusing{/g} parameter until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks.

traits.locale_text: Verbündete, die von den Kräften des Navigators anvisiert werden, erhalten bis zum Ende des nächsten Zugs des Navigators {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Boni{/g} auf alle ihre Eigenschaften, und zwar entsprechend des Parameters {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Durchdringend{/g}. Dieser Bonus wird aufaddiert und jedes Mal, wenn er aufaddiert wird, bis zum nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} des Navigators verlängert.

languages.text: Des {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} équivalant à la valeur d'{g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Imprégnation{/g} s'appliquent à toutes les {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} des alliés ciblés par les pouvoirs du navigateur jusqu'à la fin du prochain {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} de ce dernier. Ce bonus est cumulable, et à chaque cumul, il est prolongé jusqu'au tour suivant du navigateur.
languages.original_text: Allies that become targets of the Navigator's powers gain {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} equal to the {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}infusing{/g} parameter until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks.

traits.locale_text: Des {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} équivalant à la valeur du paramètre {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Infusion{/g} s'appliquent à tous les caractéristiques des alliés ciblés par les pouvoirs du Navigateur jusqu'à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} de celui-ci. Ce bonus est cumulable, et à chaque cumul il est prolongé jusqu'au tour suivant du Navigateur.

languages.text: 受导航者能力影响的盟友，所有{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}都会提高，等同于{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}灌注{/g}属性值。效果持续至导航者下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束。此效果可多次叠加，且每次叠加时，效果都会延长至导航者的下个回合。
languages.original_text: Allies that become targets of the Navigator's powers gain {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} equal to the {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}infusing{/g} parameter until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks.

traits.locale_text: 受导航者能力影响的盟友，所有属性都会提高，等同于{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}灌注{/g}属性值。效果持续至导航者下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束。此效果可多次叠加，且每次叠加时，效果都会延长至导航者的下个回合。

languages.text: Los aliados que son objetivo de un poder del navegante ganan una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} a todas sus {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g} igual al parámetro de {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}infusión{/g} hasta el fin del siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del navegante. Esta bonificación se acumula y se prolonga hasta el próximo turno del navegante cada vez que se aplica.
languages.original_text: Allies that become targets of the Navigator's powers gain {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} equal to the {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}infusing{/g} parameter until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks.

traits.locale_text: Los aliados que son objetivo de un poder del navegante ganan una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} a todas sus características igual al parámetro de {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}infusión{/g} hasta el fin del siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del navegante. Esta bonificación se acumula y se prolonga hasta el próximo turno del navegante cada vez que se aplica.

languages.text: 航宙士の力のターゲットとなった味方は航宙士の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}が終わるまで、すべての{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}に{g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}注入{/g}パラメータと同等の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を獲得する。このボーナスはスタックし、スタックするたびに航宙士の次のターンまで延長される。
languages.original_text: Allies that become targets of the Navigator's powers gain {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} equal to the {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}infusing{/g} parameter until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks.

traits.locale_text: 航宙士の力のターゲットとなった味方は航宙士の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}が終わるまで、すべての{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}に{g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}注入{/g}パラメータと同等の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を獲得する。このボーナスはスタックし、スタックするたびに航宙士の次のターンまで延長される。

languages.text: Союзники, ставшие целями сил навигатора, получают {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусы{/g} ко всем {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристикам{/g}, равные значению насыщения, до конца следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} навигатора. Этот бонус суммируется, и при каждом применении его действие продлевается до следующего хода навигатора.
languages.original_text: Allies that become targets of the Navigator's powers gain {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} equal to the {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}infusing{/g} parameter until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks.

traits.locale_text: Союзники, ставшие целями сил навигатора, получают {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусы{/g} ко всем характеристикам, равные значению {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}насыщения{/g}, до конца следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} навигатора. Этот бонус суммируется, и при каждом применении его действие продлевается до следующего хода навигатора.

Союзники, ставшие целями сил навигатора, получают {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусы{/g} ко всем характеристикам, равные значению {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}насыщения{/g}, до конца следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} навигатора. Этот бонус суммируется, и при каждом применении его действие продлевается до следующего хода навигатора.

languages.text: Rotacı güçlerinin hedef aldığı dost birimler, tüm {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}niteliklerine{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}aşılayıcı{/g} parametresine eşit miktarda {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} alırlar. Bu etki, Rotacı'nın bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} sonuna dek sürer. Bu bonus üst üste birikir ve her yeni birikimde etki süresi Rotacı'nın bir sonraki turuna dek uzar.
languages.original_text: Allies that become targets of the Navigator's powers gain {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} equal to the {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}infusing{/g} parameter until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks.
